meanings.definition: The quality or state of being extensive.
meanings.sent1: The extensity of the forest amazed me with its vastness.
meanings.sent2: The extensity of the desert stretched out endlessly before us.
meanings.sent3: The extensity of the cake was so huge that it took us days to finish it.
meanings.sent4: Her kindness had an extensity that reached every corner of the community.
meanings.sent5: The extensity of the ocean made me feel small and insignificant.

meanings.definition: The amount of space or area that something occupies.
meanings.sent1: The extensity of the parking lot allowed for many cars to park.
meanings.sent2: The extensity of the warehouse was filled with boxes and crates.
meanings.sent3: The extensity of the picnic blanket was perfect for our large group.
meanings.sent4: His laughter filled the room with an extensity that was contagious.
meanings.sent5: The extensity of the garden amazed visitors with its beauty.

meanings.definition: The degree to which something is extended in space.
meanings.sent1: The extensity of the bridge spanned the entire river.
meanings.sent2: The extensity of the road seemed to go on forever.
meanings.sent3: The extensity of the scarf allowed for various styling options.
meanings.sent4: His love for her had an extensity that reached across continents.
meanings.sent5: The extensity of the mountain range was breathtaking from afar.
